text:
food was generally good. northern style
indian cuisine. service staff was excellent. portions were abit small for the price but given this is a fine dining restaurant , understandable. will recommend to try.
Food was good but not unforgettable. Service was very good, especially the guy who attended to us. Probably one of the best service staff I have ever met. This place is expensive.

Delicious Indian food. Punctual staff. Soothing ambience.

I went for a casual dining experience, but wow! Food top notch chef, classy presentations, everything healthy. I ordered chaat, achari tikka, veg biryani (nawabi one), and rabdi jalebi (which was okayish 3.5/5), were amazingly delicious. If you are in Singapore and wish to go for a fine dine experience with Indian taste and great hospitality, Yantra is a must visit. I found it a bit pricy but looking at the quality of food, I think it’s worth.

Great experience, wish to visit again!

Celebrated our anniversary dinner here and the food was amazing ! Packed with flavours and textures. Spiced well, but some of them were too spicy for us but overall we enjoyed the food as well as their friendly hospitality.

My wife and I recently had dinner at Yantra. And it was AMAZING. This is not your usual Indian restaurant. It’s a carefully curated menu representing dishes from different regions of India. What was fascinating was the history and cultural significance behind each dish. The food and service were simply outstanding and the ambience very cosy. Big thanks to Tim and the team who attended to us. We had a delightful evening.
